title: MACGYVER SEASON 01 EP 21-22 With GR SUBS (FINAL SEASON)

TV Series  -  48 min  -  Action | Adventure | Crime

The MacGkaiver is a secret agent with a mission to neutralize those who undermine global peace and justice. But what makes it special is the means used to face the enemy. Unlike other agents, the MacGkaiver in possession of the finest and most effective super-weapon, which is nothing more than imaginative mind. Refusing to use conventional weapons, the only means usually a Swiss Army knife and insulating films, MacGkaiver chooses each time the most appropriate combination of knowledge for chemistry, physics and practical to cope with the toughest conditions or to trap the enemy. And as much enemies underestimate unorthodox methods, the more likely their plans to fail ...

Creator:
Lee David Zlotoff
Stars:
Richard Dean Anderson, Dana Elcar, Stephen Chang
